column1: Asian & Pacific Islander Semi-Annual Bilingual Employee Data (Nationally)
NOTE: A fiscal year (FY) runs from October-September. For example, October of FY 2015 is October of calendar year 2014.
* No survery was done for the second half of 2015, thus the data for July 2015 matches the data for January 2015
** Survey was done one time during these years
